title: Reset password
subtitle: Already have an account?
instruction: Make sure to choose a password that is secure and easy to remember.

validations.isLengthValid: Must be between 8 and 20 characters long.
validations.hasLowerCase: Must include at least one lowercase letter.
validations.hasUpperCase: Must include at least one uppercase letter.
validations.hasNumber: Must include at least one number.
validations.hasSpecialChar: Must include at least one special character.
